content.raw:
Thanks Carlos.  I saw your changes but it did not seem to run automatically on install (or I missed it).  I did however copy the files to /usr/local/share/gazebo-6.5/media/materials/textures and this fixed the particular error.  There is however another problem and I entered another issue to get to the proper output.
Many thanks for your support.
Pat.
content.html: Thanks Carlos. I saw your changes but it did not seem to run automatically on install (or I missed it). I did however copy the files to /usr/local/share/gazebo-6.5/media/materials/textures and this fixed the particular error. There is however another problem and I entered another issue to get to the proper output. Many thanks for your support. Pat.
